This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you interact with our website or purchase products from us. Third-Party Services We may utilize third-party services such as payment processors and shipping partners to fulfill your orders. These third parties have their own privacy policies and practices, and we recommend reviewing them before engaging with their services. Children's Privacy Our website is not directed at children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals in this age group. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will promptly delete it from our records. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in our emails. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website, and your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy. Communications We may collect information about your interactions with us, including emails, live chats, and phone calls, to improve customer service and address inquiries. Your communications with our support team may be recorded or monitored for training and quality assurance purposes. Surveys and Feedback We may invite you to participate in surveys or provide feedback on our products and services. Your responses help us understand your preferences and improve the quality of our offerings. Policy Updates We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Write to us If you have any questions, please contact us at spinworld@gmail.com Our dedicated team is here to assist you and address any inquiries you may have regarding your privacy rights and data protection.
